name: Pure Agency
description:
Since its creation in 2008, PURE AGENCY has supported the most important European brands in the re-definition of their digital strategy and the implementation of Mobile First devices.
Operating in Paris and Belgrade, the company supports its clients, mostly major accounts, across the entire mobile value chain including strategy consultancy and Mobile First design, development of mobile and responsive sites, apps for smartphones, tablets and iOT, development and steering of mobile advertising campaigns and via digital media 2.0.
